Azanett Garcia
--------------

In 2022 the Council confirmed the appointment of Azanette Garcia as Municipal Court Clerk.

[Government Code, Chapter 29](https://statutes.capitol.texas.gov/Docs/GV/htm/GV.29.htm#29.010)

![Azanett Garcia](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/3c0551_1fae7f0aa43a48b48c0e3226cb113980~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_374,h_594,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/3c0551_1fae7f0aa43a48b48c0e3226cb113980~mv2.png)

The La Joya Home-Rule Charter approved by voter in 2013 established a Municipal Court "... for the trial of misdemeanor offenses with all powers and duties granted by the laws of the State of Texas."

The Mayor and City Council are authorized to appoint a Presiding Judge "... for a term of four (4) years to run concurrently with the term of office of Mayor.  Compensation shall be set by the City Council and may not be reduced during the term of office for which the Judge was appointed. ... In the absence or disability of the Judge, the City Council shall appoint an interim judge to preside over the Municipal Court."

[News](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/news)

![Judge](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_0855c3390ec64726a661227ed664a145~mv2.jpeg/v1/crop/x_661,y_0,w_3574,h_3264/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Judge.jpeg)

* Linda Sarabia
* Anthony Uresti

![Roman numeral clock](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_02f05e0fea0846f296f4f6d0965617a9~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_389,y_0,w_3650,h_3333/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Roman%20Numeral%20Clock.jpg)

Municipal Court is in session every Wednesdays, 1:00 pm to 4:00 pm -- except for Night Court.

La Joya TX 78560-4051

![Judge and Gavel](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_d6419b63aa564644b495cc0581fb754e~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_661,y_0,w_3574,h_3264/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Judge%20and%20Gavel.jpg)

Judge Lee R. Alaniz has issued rules governing Courtroom decorum, part of the Court's
[Standing Orders](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/2f2ad4_239c7e3ede794181a6d1281ad4f721a2.pdf)
.

[Texas Penal Code, Chapter 46](https://statutes.capitol.texas.gov/Docs/PE/htm/PE.46.htm)

![Credit card](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_b278ea520c04495d871471494898216e~mv2.jpeg/v1/crop/x_184,y_0,w_3154,h_2880/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Credit%20Card.jpeg)


Traffic fines may be paid at the La Joya Municipal Court,  located at La Joya City Hall  by money order only, or you may
[pay traffi
c fines o
nline](https://trafficpayment.com/InvoiceInfo.aspx?csdId=53)
.

![Proceeding](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_6c0e87d6e2174c728dfee8194d7dda52~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_674,y_0,w_3651,h_3334/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Proceeding.jpg)

Cases are adjudicated by a Municipal Court Judge.  The
[City Attorney](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/city-attorney-s-office)
serves as Prosecutor.



City of La Joya
